name: lpss2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→((limPt ` c0)` c3)⊆((limPt ` c0)` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))

comment: Limit points of a subset are limit points of the larger set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
